entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reliability issue on ARM64 Stage1 #86929
    8.0.0
  • EnableTrimAnalyzer on netstandard2.0 projects should lead developers to success #86924
  • TypeLoadException thrown from MetadataLoadContext should expose TypeName #86923
  • Trim analyzer doesn't warn on `GetType().GetMethods()` #86921
    8.0.0
  • WASM debugger connection flakiness #86919
    8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Wasm builds breaking with trimming - `error IL2040: FSharp.Core: Could not find embedded resource 'FSharpSignatureCompressedData.FSharp.Core' to remove in assembly 'FSharp.Core'` #86916
  • Consider switching CompareExchange and similar intrinsics to have self-referring implementations. #86915
  • Consider removing all the resx schema unnecessary comments auto added by Visual Studio #86906
  • [browser][mt] Running any Thread for longer than 5000 ms crashes runtime (Blazor) #86903
    8.0.0
  • Error: Unable to read data from the transport connection: Connection reset by peer when using Httpclient in Dotnet core api #86893
  • dotnet store fails because of content files (Microsoft.NET.ComposeStore.targets(345,5): error MSB3024) #86901
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 15 Regressions on 5/27/2023 12:14:23 AM #86905
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 20 Regressions on 5/26/2023 9:55:14 AM #86904
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 40 Regressions on 5/27/2023 12:14:23 AM #86902
  • Test failure readytorun\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism.cmd #86887
  • Fix AddMetrics extension method namespace #86885
    8.0.0
  • App crashes on device when calling static abstract interface method #86884
    8.0.0
  • [mono] export containers header #86879

Closed

  • Thaisantdart•Pro #86926
  • `System.Text.Json` source generator creates default type converters for properties with `JsonConverter` attribute #86223
    8.0.0
  • `System.Text.Json` ignores `JsonConverter` attribute #86222
    8.0.0
  • Micro-optimizations for STJ generated source #52218
    Future
  • StringBuilder and exception in stringinterpolation causes partial string to be written to builder #86897
  • [API Proposal]: Consider changing return types of new throw helpers #86341
    8.0.0
  • NullReferenceException when deserializing object containing nullable struct using source generator #86483
    8.0.0
  • Standardize on DiagnosticSource/OpenTelemetry for database tracing #22336
  • System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.CreateFromDirectory: overloads to write to a stream rather than a file #1555
    8.0.0
  • Correct way to handle obsolete OOB dependencies on multi-targeted packages? #86894
  • [API Proposal]: Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #76984
    8.0.0
  • Invalid IL produced by unreachable code blocks optimization #86304
  • [wasm][hybridglobalization] ToUpper/ToLower does not work correctly when the length of character changes #86794
    8.0.0
  • RuntimeHostConfigurationOption for GC configuration ignored in NativeAOT #85961
  • [mono] Unhandled Exception in System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests #86861

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Optimize jiterpreter type cast opcodes & add zero page optimizations #86928
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Remove comment in ZipFile.Create.cs #86927
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2190984 #86925
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [main] [release/8.0-preview5] Use fully qualified type names for parameters and don't copy parameter attributes #86922
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm][debugging] Enable debugging when Device Toolbar is enabled and Iphone is selected #86920
    area-Debugger-mono
  • RemoveDirectoryRecursive: fix delete of mount points #86918
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] A few cleanups in stack walking on Windows #86917
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Test passing struct on a border of 12bit offset #86914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement AsnReader.Clone #86913
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove usage of GeneratedRegex #86911
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add individual compilation tests for each config binding overload #86910
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Create DiagnosticInfo as an incremental Diagnostic replacement type. #86908
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono][interp] Preserve type information of stack args when inlining #86898
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Implemented IndexOf and LastIndexOf functions #86895
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Implement genCodeForIncSaturate #86891
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Integrate HttpClientFactory and metrics #86888
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • For the dprintf output of the median overhead figure, the type of the… #86886
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use Knobs to populate AppContext switches #86883
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] allow creating CCW for resurrected objects #86882
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cleanup BitMapper sizeof type #86881
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution

Merged

  • Ensure Memory<T>/ReadOnlyMemory<T> are marked as unsupported types. #86900
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview5] Use fully qualified type names for parameters and don't copy parameter attributes #86899
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/8.0-preview5] [wasm][debugger] Remove usage of GeneratedRegex #86912
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix ClrEtwAllMeta.lst for the ContentionLockCreated event #86907
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Fix deserialization of nullable structs with constructors. #86896
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix assert failure in grow_heap_segment for SVR GC. #86889
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement stream-based ZipFile ExtractToDirectory and CreateFromDirectory method overloads #85491
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Change the LockCreated event to ContentionLockCreated #86817
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #83936
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix receiving of 2nd register in struct #86144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix formatting issues in DependencyGraphViewer #86890
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix branch #86482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm][globalization] `HybridGlobalization` fix bug in change case #86799
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [NativeAOT] Fix MD array GC series #86877
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not compute debug names of reflection objects #86880
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Read public GC options if available #86068
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Annotate test with IsPreciseGcSupported #86869
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

Updated

  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] A few changes to make stack walks a bit faster #86690
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix warnings found with CA1861 Avoid constant arrays as arguments #86229
    area-Meta
  • JIT: expand qmarks earlier #86778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] implement Interlocked.ReadMemoryBarrier intrinsic #86842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ApplyStartupHook diagnostic IPC command #86813
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update to use the cbl-mariner webassembly images. #86806
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Use underlying type converter for nullable type #84208
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Perf: Use `test-main.js` instead of `test-main-7.0.js` #86742
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-meta-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [RISC-V] Optimize Load Immediate #86790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fold const WithElement to CNS_VEC #86212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] redesign the Prolog/Epilog for enabling OSR. #86866
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update binder gen parser to issue diagnostics for invalid input types #86856
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #73893
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Expose IUtf8SpanParsable and implement it on the primitive numeric types #86875
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • The ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder generated parameter should not have default value by default #84550
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Update to the 22.04 debpkg image so we're on a newer ubuntu version. #86803
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Introduction to vectorization with Vector128 and Vector256 #84115
    area-Meta
  • Fixing the InstructionSetDesc implications #86486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [release/7.0-staging] CI: Fix running the workaround for `NuGet-Migrations` issue #86812
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Devirtualization with multiple guesses: JIT #86809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft][browser] thread experiments #86759
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample as functional test on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize const ShiftRightLogical for byte values on XArch #86841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging][mono][debugger] Remove cast bug #86862
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.x
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` set flag in SDK #85245
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Missing symbol crash fix #86864
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #84250
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • NET 5 cannot produce console app with visible window if it references Windows Forms #14503
  • NET 5.0 - Issues with ProjectReference targetting 3.x with WinRT dependencies #14548
  • Targeting net5.0-windows still causes 'API X is supported on windows' errors #14502
  • Error while running dotnet build in a new test project #32061
  • dotnet test --results-directory behavior change #11575

Updated

  • Downlevel wasm tests fail on net6.0.x runtime pack download #32864
    8.0.1xx
  • failed to find runtime pack #32205
  • dotnet publish does not copy all files. #14622
    Discussion
  • WPF application does not compile anymore moving from Core 3.1 to .NET 5 (assemblies not found in refs folder) #14522
    Discussion
  • Unable to add providers to MsDeploy manifest #14491
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Watch.BrowserRefresh causes Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref 6.0 prebuilts #30272
  • GenAPI emits default constructors when reading from metadata #32165
  • Running the console app #17541
    Backlog
  • Test project for .NET 7 Android project not working. #29172
    Discussion
  • Error while running dotnet test on Ubuntu-latest in GitHub actions #29742
  • It_builds_successfully_when_targeting_net_framework test wants to compile a .NETCoreApp template on .NET Framework #29968
  • DotNet Test is no longer filtering by Category #30931
  • `dotnet test --filter` appears to have a hidden character count limitation for tests with long names #28118
  • Testing ns2.0 libraries, ambiguous reference issues #30151
  • dotnet test --no-build should fail when the target framework wasn't build #31326
  • dotnet test error MSB4181: The "Microsoft.TestPlatform.Build.Tasks.VSTestTask" task returned false but did not log an error #13431
  • [NETE2ESDK][Loc][Regression]With VS 17.7 preview 2 + net 8 preview 5, Out of support warning for net5.0/netcoreapp 3.1/netcorapp2.1 projects is unlocalized on Japanese OS. #32592
  • [NETE2ESDK][Loc]With VS 17.7 preview 2 + net 8 preview 5, warning NETSDK1201 message is unlocalized when publishing net 7.0 project. #32595
  • .NET 8: [breaking] dotnet build/publish does not produce an exe/apphost for portable apps by default #23545
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Rename GenAPI IncludeVisibleOutsideOfAssembly #32905
    untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] excluded containerize from source-build #32895
    Area-Containers

Merged

  • Prevent restore loop in VS #31798
    Area-External, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2190843 #32811
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Preview 6 branding #32796
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Read workload sets in workload manifest reader #32766
    Area-Workloads
  • Containers: fix handling of ContainerBaseImage without a registry. #32876
    untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] bug fixes related to AWS ECR #32890
    Area-Containers
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.0.0 to 20.3.0 in /eng/dependabot #32881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.0.0 to 20.3.0 in /eng/dependabot #32880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Updated

  • Reference ILLink analyzer matching ILLink version #32045
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package (#29787) #32734
    Area-Compilers, Servicing-approved, 7.0.8
  • 9500 dotnet tool install: Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade when specify version #31549
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • An initial take at fixing the use of aliases.First() across the templating codebase #32144
    untriaged
  • Containers: add support for using 'podman' without a system 'docker' alias. #32783
    untriaged
  • Interactive mode proof of concept #30832
    Area-dotnet new
  • Use Task.CompletedTask #24462

Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalid CS8602 calling base constructor when using primary constructors #68384
  • Wrong error message (out parameter must be assigned to before control leaves) #68380
  • Code Cleanup always makes private field as readonly #68378
  • When moving class to another namespace, the this. qualification is removed from the code (IDE0009). #68377
  • Rename doubles characters when identifier is at the end of the document #68375
  • Cursor jumps while renaming in the editor #68374

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix HasFileLocalTypes check for constructed types #68386
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix 'use primary constructor' when parameter name matches a keyword name #68385
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Match short lowercase substrings in pattern matcher #68383
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update our 'delay until visible' logic to not throw cancellation exceptions #68382
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update taggers to cooperate with each other for accessing the UI thread. #68381
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement IOperation support for inline array access #68373
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.4 #68379
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move LongPath check to MSBuild target #68217
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Don't give duplicate member error for explicit implementations of different file-local interfaces with same source name #68331
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • add Version.Details entries for source-build product build #68371
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • [EnC] Upgrade change types for containing types #68368
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Implement extension member lookup (non-generic) #68342
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Switch to primary constructors in IDE layer #68299
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Clear dead links to feature branches in `Language Feature Status.md` #68317
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Expect mapped paths in InterceptsLocationAttribute #68242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move tests of `IDE0060` to `VerifyCS` #68350
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Implement definite assignment and region analysis for inline array types #68339
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Initialize 'Flags' and 'DeclarationModifiers' in constructor of SourceMemberMethodSymbol #68347
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Design Debt, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mvc.Api.Analyzers.ApiConventionAnalyzer throws ArgumentNullException when action doesn't return #48528
  • .NET 7 regression generic array parameters 35980 #48526
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts #48525
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, https, plainTextWithFilter #48524
  • Blazor raises Permission Denied error when calling JS function with a cross-origin Window object as parameter #48521
  • ApplicationPartManager and IOC #48520
  • Starting Community Triagers process in our repo #48512
    Discussions

Closed

  • Fix CloseMessage issues #34294
  • Failed to launch debug adapter error with latest VS preview & .NET 8.0 runtime (from main) #48514
    8.0-preview5
  • Perf regression: json #48498
  • Request Delegate Generator fails to compile endpoint with Uri? parameter with CS8600 errors #48378
    8.0-preview6
  • "DisposeFailed" log messages of Blazor CircuitHost should be more visible #48418
  • Support reading DisableInferBodyFromParameters at runtime #47239
    8.0-preview5
  • A Blazor component that has inherited from another Blazor component, when used is interpreted as bare html #48496
  • [8.0.100-preview.5.23276.4] DotNet.jsCallDispatcher.disposeJSObjectReferenceById is missing from blazor.server.js #48513
    8.0-preview6
  • Cookie name are case-sensitive #48421
  • Quarantine E2E Component tests related to scrolling within page #47967
    8.0-preview6

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm][debugging] Enable debugging when Device Toolbar is enabled and Iphone is selected #48527
    area-blazor
  • Sections with other features #48518
    area-blazor
  • SDK update. #48511
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [Blazor] Update template to only include inspectUri when using Web assembly #48519
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5
  • [release/8.0-preview5] [Blazor] Update template to only include inspectUri when using Web assembly #48523
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 8.0-preview5
  • [release/8.0-preview5] Fix IJSObjectReference disposal #48522
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Fix display format for type. #48419
    NativeAOT, feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-preview6
  • Update SDK #48252
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2190249 #48387
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview6

Updated

  • Rename ASP.NET Core metrics #48375
    blocked, area-runtime, area-signalr
  • Make problemdetails settable in problemdetailscontext #48510
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Don't run publish-specific Mvc.Testing tasks if project is not publishable #48364
    area-mvc, feature-mvc-testing, 6.0.x
  • feat: add StringSyntaxAttribute for guid and timespan args #48402
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Introduce KestrelServerOptions.AllowUnsafeHostHeaderOverride #48460
    blocked, area-runtime
  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #48414
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement output-cache store using redis #48450
    area-runtime, feature-output-caching

Issues

Updated

  • Missing symbols for only dotnet code #3900
    8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Code Signing fails for iOS #15344
  • MAUI storage preferences not retrieving the Xamarin forms application properties #15343
  • Grid Overflow when content is too large #15342
  • Splitter/Split View (User Adjustable) #15341
  • Android: Border offset from its region, and increases with DPI #15339
  • Keyboard is opened when Searchbar is cancelled #15333
    Backlog
  • Auto specified for Height of RowDefinition of Grid does not work as intended. #15332
    Backlog

Closed

  • Scrollview does not calculate ContentHeight correctly on ios #14986
  • [Enhancement] IQKeyboardManager #1396
    Backlog
  • Will it be possible to use tabbed pages with shell navigation? #15335
  • WebAuthenticatorResult should do a UrlDecode on the values when populating Properties #9223
    Backlog
  • Windows - TextToSpeech.Default.SpeakAsync is not awaited. #8753
    Backlog
  • [MAC/iOS] Enabling RightToLeft for scroll view at the run time is not working #9518
    Backlog
  • Path resources cannot be consumed multiple times via StaticResource #9747
    Backlog
  • CollectionView does not allow clicking of child elements #10209
    Backlog
  • Compiling as DLL with ApplicationDisplayVersion higher than 1.0 fails #10579
    Backlog
  • Dotnet restore fails when ApplicationDisplayVersion has some values to configure Unit Test for MAUI #12859
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [CI] Remove the template explosion in the CI via a matrix #15340
  • Add some tests for changing the app version properties #15338
  • [net8.0] Merge net8 3 #15337

Merged

  • Add UITest Gallery and some simple tests #15191
    area/testing
  • Fix issue with CollectionView ignoring margins for content #15246
    area/collectionview 📃, backport/suggested
  • [net8.0] Merge net8 2 #15336
  • [CI] Remove the template explosion in the CI via a matrix #15334
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Fix e-mail URI escaping recipients #15244
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Set Version for Windows #15238
    backport/suggested, backport/approved
  • Use [AppendTo|PrependTo|Replace]Mapping for Focus commands #15040
  • [net7.0] Set Version for Windows #15240

Updated

  • Ensure "text boxes" preserve cursor location #15099
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Formalize virtual layout concepts and fix iOS memory leaks #15303
  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
    area/shell 🐢
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Image #15062
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️
  • [ios] fix memory leaks in ContentView #15193
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168
    area/controls 🎮
  • Publish ControlGallery to run tests #15194
    area/testing
  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846
  • Move some controls to use ModifyMapping #15058
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When using SqlServerRetryingExecutionStrategy, on retry exception thrown #31000
  • As of EF7 Scaffold-DbContext doesn't handle columns computed from a function #30999
  • Scaffolding synapse fails when attempting to enumerate triggers #30998
  • Cosmos: Is it possible to re-add the Discriminator constraint when using FromSqlRaw on specific set? #30997
  • Incorrect translation of comparison of current value with owned type default value #30996
  • DBContext is not thread-safe. How to correctly use EFCore in a multi-threaded environment? Is it not recommended to use EFCore in multi-threaded programs? #30995
  • Query/Json: data corruption for tracking queries with nested json entities, then updating nested entities outside EF and re-querying #30993

Closed

  • IDbContextFactory and AsNoTracking #30985
  • EntityFramework Core 7.0 GIN search accuracy #30994

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixes attempt to scaffold triggers on synapse re: issue #30998 #31001
  • SDK update #30992

Updated

  • Disregard parameter names in `ExpressionEqualityComparer.GetHashCode` #30755
    waiting-for-response
  • Generate OPENJSON with WITH unless ordering is required #30983
  • Translate to IN + subquery when possible instead of EXISTS #30976
